message.content:
cs.SI, cs.SOC, cs.DB, cs.DS, cs.IR 

Reasoning: 
1. cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) - The paper deals with influence maximization and subscription on social networks, which falls under the scope of this sub-category. 
2. cs.SOC (Social and Information Networks) - Similar to cs.SI, this sub-category also deals with social networks and their analysis. 
3. cs.DB (Databases) - The paper proposes an algorithm to efficiently calculate influence over dynamically updating social networks, which involves database management. 
4. cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) - The paper proposes a Prefix Tree Structure to minimize the times of calculating influence of each update, which falls under the scope of this sub-category. 
5. cs.IR (Information Retrieval) - The paper deals with topic-aware subscription queries, which involves information retrieval techniques.
